cn.title: 关于比特派暂停 SAFE 充提的公告

message.data: 由于 SAFE 主网升级，为了保障平台用户利益，比特派将于香港时间2018年9月10日10:00关闭充提功能，恢复时间请关注后续通知。
请注意，充提服务暂停期间请不要进行 SAFE 的收发，以免造成不必要的资产损失。SAFE官网网址：https://www.anwang.com/

Bitpie 社群：
新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“比特派钱包”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1

en.title: Bitpie Wallet Has Suspended the Deposit and Withdrawal of SAFE

message.data: Bitpie Wallet has closed the deposit and withdrawal functions due to the mainnet upgrade of SAFE for the security of the assets of Bitpiers. Please wait for the resumption.
Notice: Before the resumption, please don’t receive and send SAFE in case of assets loss. The official website of SAFE is：https://www.anwang.com/

Find us on
Telegram：t.me/BitpieInternational
Twitter：twitter.com/BitpieWallet
Medium: https://medium.com/@Bitpie
